document.full_text: david lighty's nearly flawless shooting performance helped the no. 1 buckeyes turn an early deficit into a runaway victory over the no. 8 patriots.
document.title: east: ohio state 98, george mason 66: slow at start, ohio state finds its rhythm in rout of george mason
lines_and_colors: david lighty's nearly flawless shooting performance helped the no. 1 buckeyes turn an early deficit into a runaway victory over the no. 8 patriots.
